mosinstall.name: Search Directory: Fixed Categories
mosinstall.author: Mosets Consulting
mosinstall.license: This software is copyrighted to the author
mosinstall.description: This module will display a search box and a drop down categories for Mosets Tree

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: parent_cat
param.label: Parent Cat. ID
param.description: Enter a parent category's ID. The module will load all the sub categories for this parent and present it as a drop down box.

param.name: width
param.label: Box Width
param.description: Size of the search text box

param.name: text
param.label: Text
param.description: The text that appears in the search text box, if left blank it will load _SEARCH_BOX from your language file

param.name: advsearch
param.label: Advanced Search
param.description: Display an Advanced Search to allow visitors to use the Advanced Search page
